layer at (0,0) size 800x600
  LayoutView at (0,0) size 800x600
layer at (0,0) size 800x60
  LayoutBlockFlow {html} at (0,0) size 800x60
    LayoutBlockFlow {body} at (8,8) size 784x44
      LayoutTable {table} at (0,0) size 492x44 [border: (1px outset #808080)]
        LayoutTableSection (anonymous) at (1,1) size 490x42
          LayoutTableRow {tr} at (0,10) size 490x22
            LayoutTableCell {td} at (10,10) size 230x22 [border: (1px inset #808080)] [r=0 c=0 rs=1 cs=1]
              LayoutText {#text} at (2,2) size 226x18
                text run at (2,2) width 226: "This cell should have 10px spacing"
            LayoutTableCell {td} at (250,10) size 230x22 [border: (1px inset #808080)] [r=0 c=1 rs=1 cs=1]
              LayoutText {#text} at (2,2) size 226x18
                text run at (2,2) width 226: "This cell should have 10px spacing"
